articles.author: Niamh Shackleton
articles.title: Viewers left stunned after watching new harrowing drama series based on true story - UNILAD
articles.description: Masters of the Air viewers have hailed the new series as 'very intense' as the series dropped on Apple TV+ January 26
articles.content:
24 hours on from the release of Masters of the Air, the verdicts are in.
The highly anticipated new series dropped on Apple TV+ yesterday (January 26), and boasts an all-star cast made up of the lik… [+2241 chars]
